title: Moto g22 (Cosmic Black, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, TurboPower 20W Charger, USB Cable, Guides, Sim Tool
product_specification.SAR Value: Head: 1.18 W/kg at 1g, Body: 1.44 W/kg at 1g
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 4G LTE: B1/B3/B5/B7/B8/B20/B38/B40/B41, 3G UMTS: B1/B2/B5/B8, 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Quad Camera Setup: 50MP Main Camera (f/1.8 Aperture, 0.64um Pixel Size, 4 in 1 with 1.28?m, PDAF, Quad Pixel Technology) + 8MP (f/2.2 Aperture, 1.12um Pixel Size, 118 Degree Ultra Wide Angle + 2MP Macro Camera (f/2.4 Aperture, 1.75um Pixel Size) + 2MP Depth Camera (f/2.4 Aperture, 1.75um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Portrait, Photo, Video, Panorama, Night Vision, Pro Mode, Ultra-Wide, Macro Vision, Artificial intelligence: Google Lens Integration, Other Features: Face Beauty, HDR, 50M High-Res, Timer, Assistive Grid, Watermark, Video Feature: Timelapse, Snap in Video Recording
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP Camera Setup: (f/2.45 Aperture, 1.0um Pixel Size), Camera Feature: Portrait, Photo, Video, Pro Mode, Dual Capture, Night Vision, Face Beauty, Leveler, Assistive Grid, Watermark, HDR, Timer, Mirror, Video Feature: Snap in Video Recording
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps) | Front: 1080p (at 30 fps), 720p (at 30 fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint reader, Proximity sensor, Ambient Light sensor, Accelerometer, Notification LED, Gyroscope, e-Compass, SAR
product_specification.Other Features: Water Repellant Design, Bottom Ported Loudspeaker, 1 Microphone, Side Fingerprint Reader, Face Unlock
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS, A-GPS, LTEPP, SUPL, GLONASS, GALILEO
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.16 MP Front Camera: With the 16 MP selfie camera, you can take stunning selfies every time you feel like setting your Instagram ablaze. The front camera setup of this phone features a tiny aperture yet a big depth of focus, allowing you to view more of the world around you.
product_description.50 MP Quad Camera: This smartphone comes with a 50 MP Quad Camera that allows you to take crystal-clear photos in any lighting scenario. Its Quad Pixel technology improves low-light sensitivity resulting in clear and vivid photographs. Moreover, this phone boasts an 8 MP Ultra-wide Lens, Macro Vision, and Depth Sensor enabling you to take a full family picture with impeccable clarity.

review: overall it is a slow category phone. sensitivity very poor. camera is not like 50 mp it is like a 20mp camera. apps r not open quickly. photo quality is normal. it is not a best choise in thi range. i m not satisfied with this product.

If you like LAGGY go for it .

It's slow and hanging for even day to day task. Taking 4-7 seconds for apps to open and over that not at all smooth while using the apps. Should have been provided with atleast a decent processor which can support smooth day to day task. If your budget is 10K you can go to Moto E40 which is many times better than this faulty product.

questions: Q:Does Moto G22 support Moto gestures?
Q:Does Moto G22 support Fast/Quick/Turbo charging?
Q:Does it support VoWiFi and VoLTE?
Q:Can I use a USB-C Pen Drive on the phone?
Q:What's the weight of the phone?
Q:Can I capture good memories with Moto G22?
Q:How is the performance of Moto G22?
Q:Can I change the UI/UX of the mobile?
Q:How's the selfie camera in Moto G22?
Q:Does Moto G22 have ultra wide and macro cameras?
Q:How ThinkShield security in Moto G22 useful for me?
Q:Can I use my Bluetooth headset and accessories?
Q:Does Moto G22 have good storage option?
Q:What is the benefit of face beauty mode in Moto G22 ?
answers: A:Yes, this phone supports all your favorite moto experiences, including moto display, chop chop flashlight, twist to open camera and others
A:Yes, the phone supports 20W TurboPower charging which gives you a day's power in 30 minutes
A:Yes, it supports both VoWiFi and VoLTE
A:Yes, the phone�supports USB OTG for USB type C devices
A:It is quite light at 185 grams
A:This phone has a Quad camera camera comprising of 50MP (f/1.8) Quad Pixel technology lens, 8MP ultra-wide angle lens, 2MP Macro lens and 2MP Depth lens. There is a lens for every occasion.
A:The 50MP camera supports PDAF which allows you to quickly capture pictures. You can also shoot Full HD videos at 30 fps.
A:This phone has Octa core MediaTek Helio G37 SoC with 4GB RAM & 64GB storage with near stock Android 12, which gives a smooth and lag free experience
A:This phone's MY UX lets you customize UI settings with advanced controls. You can create you own unique device themes by choosing fonts, colors, and icon shapes that you prefer.
A:This phone has a 16MP (f/2.45) front camera, which is best in class
A:It comes with the latest near Stock Android 12 Operating system
A:Yes, it has 8MP f/2.2 ultra-wide angle lens with 118 degree field of view and 2 MP f/2.4 macro vision lens which allows you to fit more of the scene in your frame or to catch the tiniest of details
A:This phone comes with battery capacity of 5000mAh that allows you to go through your day without needing to recharge. The 20W charger ensures your phone charges quickly.
A:This phone provides Business grade security like Built-in Hardware security, Secure Supply chain,Android OS- Core Security & Policies and Elevated security protocols for E2E security and privacy.
A:Yes, the phone supports Bluetooth version 5.0 to simultaneously connect with multiple Bluetooth devices
A:Yes, This phone has 64GB of built-in-storage and supports microSD card of up to 1 TB which means you will not have to worry about running out of space
A:Face Beauty improves your selfies by smoothing the skin to reduce blemishes or wrinkles, giving you the perfect picture
